name: Peryton
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can\'t speak

traits.Dive Attack: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 (2d8) damage to the target.
traits.Flyby: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy\'s reach.
traits.Keen Sight and Smell: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.
